unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The New Study Buddy for Indian Students?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The New Study Buddy for Indian Students?**

unnormalised: Are you prepping for your IIT-JEE or cracking the UPSC this year? Then listen up! Exam prep apps are becoming seriously popular, kinda like how everyone suddenly wants biryani during Eid. Forget those dusty textbooks; now, everything is on your phone!
normalised: Are you prepping for your I I T-J E E or cracking the U P S C this year? Then listen up! Exam prep apps are becoming seriously popular, kinda like how everyone suddenly wants biryani during Eid. Forget those dusty textbooks; now, everything is on your phone!

unnormalised: "We've seen a 300% increase in downloads around Onam," says Priya Sharma, founder of 'Padhai Pe Dhyan,' a popular app. She adds students find interactive quizzes and video lectures way more engaging.
normalised: "We've seen a three hundred percent increase in downloads around Onam," says Priya Sharma, founder of 'Padhai Pe Dhyan,' a popular app. She adds students find interactive quizzes and video lectures way more engaging.

unnormalised: These apps offer everything from mock tests mirroring the actual exam pattern to personalized study plans. Imagine getting a detailed analysis of your strengths and weaknesses without shelling out Rs. 10,000 for a coaching center!
normalised: These apps offer everything from mock tests mirroring the actual exam pattern to personalized study plans. Imagine getting a detailed analysis of your strengths and weaknesses without shelling out rupee ten thousand for a coaching center!

unnormalised: Plus, features like doubt clearing forums, where you can ask questions and get answers from expert teachers, are proving to be a game-changer. Even students in remote areas of Bihar, miles away from fancy coaching institutes, can now access quality education. Is this the future of education, folks? Looks like it!
normalised: Plus, features like doubt clearing forums, where you can ask questions and get answers from expert teachers, are proving to be a game-changer. Even students in remote areas of Bihar, miles away from fancy coaching institutes, can now access quality education. Is this the future of education, folks? Looks like it!
